title: Hacking up Hollywood (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
itunes:title: Hacking up Hollywood (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
description: Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing the story regarding Kathy Griffin and celebrity attorney Lisa Bloom before examining what about Drew and his behavior tends to lead Adam to thinking that Drew can be classified as a puss. Adam gives his tips on how to spot a hack in Hollywood as he laments the creatively bankrupt entertainment products that plagued his childhood. The guys take a call about a vape lounge owner who's fighting an ordinance to change the restricted age to 21 instead of 18.
